endpoints.description: Retrieve a complete list of all chemicals currently managed in the inventory.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific chemical by its unique identifier.
Add a new chemical to the inventory with its relevant details.
Update the details of an existing chemical in the inventory.
Remove a specific chemical from the inventory based on its unique identifier.
List all inventory items nearing their expiration dates.
Compile a report on compliance adherence for storage regulations of all chemicals.
Request automatic replenishment for specific chemicals with low stock levels.
Generate and retrieve a summary report of the inventory status.
Update the settings and requirements for chemical storage conditions.
